item.title: Adding a clicking timer
item.dc:creator: @element0189 element0189
item.description:
@element0189 wrote:

I’m trying to add a clicking timer to stop massers but when i added “public int actionTimer = 0;” I can only click the object once. What do I do?

Heres my code:

case 2875: if(actionTimer == 0) { anim(645); Send("You pray to Guthix..."); addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 12; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Read full topic
